answers.answer: Its not THAT harmful rn like ur going to. Have alotta ppl.comment.on this. But as ur baby develops more and more. It can harm.them and.thier lungs. You have to.be very careful towards like 20 and up because thats when their organs and brain are maturing most. You.should think.of quiting soon. Btw i hope you know when you smoke so.does your baby which means that it will.also.stay.in thier devolping system for 30+ days as well.  Probably longer because thier bodies are much tinyer than.urs and they cant get rid of waste.as fast. It will be affecting them. My advice would be to cut down and eventually quit for ur angel. Its only.9 months u feel me

From what I understand it's not...good. The smoke inhalation just alone is of course awful, but also the THC is not healthy for a growing fetus.Especially so early on for you, I wouldn't risk it. In the first trimester it's such a crucial time for fetal development. You'll have to try your hardest to just put food in your stomach without smoking for the sake of the baby.Good luck.
As lomg as u are getting ur prenatal ur baby will be fine u dont need to eat for 2 especially so early

The Endocannabanoid (I know I spelled that wrong) system is active in baby at about 26weeks. There is ZERO scientific proof that THC is harmful to a developing fetus...but CAN and WILL affect the frontal cortex of the brain in the Third trimester. And if you have high BP, MJ can cause Preeclampsia. Use as little as possible and ween down. It took me some time as well, I partake due to anxiety and smoked till about 23 weeks. FYI, took us 8yrs to make our baby and I of all people wouldn't do ANYTHING to harm this pregnancy or growing child. Nay sayers be Nay, but until you are walking in these shoes... Stfu :D

I smoke for anxiety but not when pregnant. I don't know where you live but I'm I. NY there is a new drug policy every doctor tests for all drugs round 20 weeks so unless you want cps Involved don't do it its only 9 months and if you can hold out on. Alcohol I dont see a problem. Doctors can prescribe you meds for nausea..
And most hospitals check the baby for drugs when their born so its def. Of worth it.
I know now in Tennessee, it is illegal for mothers to be to fail any drug screens! They will call the law and DCS...just a warning

I agree with abbb01 its fine not to have appetite in pregnancy and as long as your taking your vitamins you should be good. I was like that in the start of my pregnancy and have only gained about 6 lbs thru it all and was concerned about it too but doctor told me as long as I drink my vitamins and try eat at least little portions I'm good and now I'm 31 weeks with a very healthy baby.

question: How harmful is smoking weed for the baby, I'm about 6 weeks and I have no appetite unless I smoke.
title: I was just wondering
